newsitem.title: TURKEY: SOCCER-BESIKTAS PLAN TO PENSION OFF THEIR FANS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-BESIKTAS PLAN TO PENSION OFF THEIR FANS.

text.p: Besiktas fans will soon be able to save for retirement while cheering on their team.
The leading Turkish club plan to introduce special "combination" match tickets which will contribute to a new pension scheme.
"Come to the match, and retire," the campaign slogan will read, club director Husnu Gureli was quoted as saying in the Fotomac sports daily on Wednesday.
"We are thinking of covering 300,000 Besiktas fans, after 10en years our supporters can retire," he said.
Gureli said that under the scheme supporters would get a return of four to one on their contributions and would be able to take out credit on the scheme after three years.
"We expect to make $10 million a year profit from this," he said.
